title: Researchers use neuroimaging to measure early cognitive improvement after mild TBI (Kessler Foundation)
text: ( Source : Kessler Foundation ) WEST ORANGE, NJ September 21 , 2015 . Researchers published results of a novel study of the functional activation patterns of working memory after mild traumatic brain injury ( TBI ). This study, the first to enroll
